body:
fixes #23923

With this PR:

```
$ spack env activate --temp
$ spack install zlib
==> All of the packages are already installed
==> Updating view at /tmp/spack-faiirgmt/.spack-env/view
$ spack install zlib
==> All of the packages are already installed
```

Before this PR:

```
$ spack env activate --temp
$ spack install zlib
==> All of the packages are already installed
$ spack install zlib
==> All of the packages are already installed
```

No view was generated
title: Regenerate views when specs already installed
